properties.name: i2f.jdbc.bql.enable
properties.description: whether enable auto-configuration for jdbc bql.

properties.name: i2f.jdbc.proxy.enable
properties.description: whether enable auto-configuration for jdbc proxy.

properties.name: i2f.jdbc.proxy.mapper-packages
properties.description: whether enable auto-configuration for jdbc proxy mapper packages.

properties.name: i2f.jdbc.proxy.script-locations
properties.description: whether enable auto-configuration for jdbc proxy script locations.

properties.name: i2f.jdbc.procedure.enable
properties.description: whether enable auto-configuration for jdbc procedure.

properties.name: jdbc.xml.procedure.debug
properties.description: whether enable debug log for jdbc procedure.

properties.name: jdbc.xml.procedure.report-on-boot
properties.description: whether enable report grammar issue on boot for jdbc procedure.

properties.name: xproc4j.enable
properties.description: whether enable auto-configuration for jdbc procedure.

properties.name: xproc4j.debug
properties.description: whether enable debug log for jdbc procedure.

properties.name: xproc4j.report-on-boot
properties.description: whether enable report grammar issue on boot for jdbc procedure.

properties.name: xproc4j.xml-locations
properties.description: whether enable auto-configuration for jdbc procedure xml locations.

properties.name: xproc4j.refresh-xml-interval-seconds
properties.description: whether enable auto-configuration for jdbc procedure refresh xml interval seconds.

properties.name: xproc4j.slow-sql-min-mills-seconds
properties.description: setting executor slow sql min mills-seconds.

properties.name: xproc4j.naming-context.enable
properties.description: whether enable bean INamingContext.

properties.name: xproc4j.event-handler.enable
properties.description: whether enable bean XProc4jEventHandler.

properties.name: xproc4j.provider.xml-node.scan.enable
properties.description: whether enable bean JdbcProcedureXmlNodeMetaProvider.

properties.name: xproc4j.provider.java-caller.enable
properties.description: whether enable bean JdbcProcedureJavaCallerMetaProvider.

properties.name: xproc4j.provider.registry.enable
properties.description: whether enable bean JdbcProcedureMetaProviderRegistry.

properties.name: xproc4j.context.enable
properties.description: whether enable bean JdbcProcedureContext.

properties.name: xproc4j.executor.enable
properties.description: whether enable bean JdbcProcedureExecutor.

properties.name: xproc4j.procedure-meta.grammar-reporter.enable
properties.description: whether enable bean ProcedureMetaMapGrammarReporterListener.
